descript.abstract: This data set depicts 30-year averages (1961-1990) of monthly and annual sum precipitation for Minnesota. These isolines and regions were created using kriging and latticecontour operations on precipitation point data from a 5-state area. Data is stored in a regions model, with separate regions for each monthly and annual sum 30-year average (e.g., region.apr represents the average April sum precipitation across Minnesota for the period 1961-1990).
descript.purpose: Climatic analyses and forecasting; hydrologic modeling; forestry/agricultural analyses

timeperd.current: Contours and regions are derived from data collected at 822 stations across a 5-state area (Minnesota, Wisconsin, North Dakota, South Dakota, Iowa) over the period 1961-1990.

attracc.attraccr: Source table PRCP_YR30LN1.DBF: Attribute accuracy of the data are technically unknown, although the data source has been used extensively for the past three years without any known problems.

dataqual.logic: Data are topologically correct using ARC/INFO 7.0.3. All polygons are closed and lines intersect where intended. Data has been checked for attribute record lengths, dangle errors, label errors, and consistency of arc and polygon attributes and annotation.
dataqual.complete: Coverage exists for entire state of Minnesota; lattices cover 5-state area.

procstep.procdesc: Attribute Lineage for source table PRCP_YR30LN1.DBF: Some attribute table restructuring was performed during the GIS Core Library development effort in March 1996. This entailed bringing the data into compliance with the DNR Public Land Survey Coding Standard (Division of Minerals-1995)

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).
